text: @WhiteHouse Flu season 2021 So the NHS will be fighting on two fronts flu virus and coronavirus will we be in at new lock down at the end of the year new lock down 2021 because the coronavirus is not going away any time soon for years no Vaccine no jobs no money no life Mental health
